content:
See a new section:

In the selection list for icons it is also displayed in the smaller size. I had similar issues with AvNav and SVG icons. Using versions saved by Inkscape after changing just the color looks quite different. I manage to eliminate the problem by changing width=“64” height=“64” to width=“18mm” height=“18mm”. It would be enough to just document that behaviour in my view.

Even to me this is totally incomprehensible.

  • What does "Similar issues" refer to?
  • In which file(s) are these changes done?
  • What behaviour should be documented, is it perhaps already documented since this is the manual?

In general it is IMHO a bad idea to just copy paste some random stuff from an issue to the manual like this. OTOH, it would probably be good to add a link to the original issue at https://github.com/OpenCPN/OpenCPN/issues/3931 so readers has a chance to get more context and not least a check on if there are any issue updates.
